1: וַֽיְהִי֙ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>came</n> בִּשְׁנַ֣ת <sup>8141 </sup> <n>year</n> אַרְבַּ֔ע <sup>702 </sup> <n>And it came to pass in the fourth</n> לְדָרְיָ֖וֶשׁ <sup>1867 </sup> <n>Darius</n> הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>of king</n> הָיָ֨ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>came</n> דְבַר־ <sup>1697 </sup> <n>[that] the word</n> יְהוָ֜ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> זְכַרְיָ֗ה <sup>2148 </sup> <n>came unto Zechariah</n> בְּאַרְבָּעָ֛ה <sup>702 </sup> <n>in the fourth</n> לַחֹ֥דֶשׁ <sup>2320 </sup> <n>month</n> הַתְּשִׁעִ֖י <sup>8671 </sup> <n>[day] of the ninth</n> בְּכִסְלֵֽו׃ <sup>3691 </sup> <n>[even] in Chisleu</n>
2: וַיִּשְׁלַח֙ <sup>7971 </sup> <n>When they had sent</n> בֵּֽית־ אֵ֔ל <sup>1008 </sup> <n>Bethel</n> שַׂר־ אֶ֕צֶר <sup>8272 </sup> <n>Sherezer</n> וְרֶ֥גֶם מֶ֖לֶךְ <sup>7278 </sup> <n>and Regemmelech</n> וַֽאֲנָשָׁ֑יו <sup>582 </sup> <n>and their men</n> לְחַלּ֖וֹת <sup>2470 </sup> <n>to pray</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> פְּנֵ֥י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before</n> יְהוָֽה׃ <sup>3069 </sup> <n>God</n>
3: לֵאמֹ֗ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>[And] to speak</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> הַכֹּֽהֲנִים֙ <sup>3548 </sup> <n>unto the priests</n> אֲשֶׁר֙ <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> לְבֵית־ <sup>1004 </sup> <n>which [were] in the house</n> יְהוָ֣ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> צְבָא֔וֹת <sup>6635 </sup> <n>of hosts</n> וְאֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>and to</n> הַנְּבִיאִ֖ים <sup>5030 </sup> <n>and to the prophets</n> לֵאמֹ֑ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>saying</n> הַֽאֶבְכֶּה֙ <sup>1058 </sup> <n>Should I weep</n> בַּחֹ֣דֶשׁ <sup>2320 </sup> <n>month</n> הַחֲמִשִׁ֔י <sup>2549 </sup> <n>in the fifth</n> הִנָּזֵ֕ר <sup>5144 </sup> <n>separating</n> כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> עָשִׂ֔יתִי <sup>6213 </sup> <n>myself as I have done</n> זֶ֖ה <sup>2088 </sup> <n>these</n> כַּמֶּ֥ה <sup>4100 </sup> <n>many</n> שָׁנִֽים׃ <sup>8141 </sup> <n>whole age</n> פ
4: וַיְהִ֛י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>came</n> דְּבַר־ <sup>1697 </sup> <n>Then came the word</n> יְהוָ֥ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> צְבָא֖וֹת <sup>6635 </sup> <n>of hosts</n> אֵלַ֥י <sup>413 </sup> <n>to me</n> לֵאמֹֽר׃ <sup>559 </sup> <n>unto me saying</n>
5: אֱמֹר֙ <sup>559 </sup> <n>Speak</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> עַ֣ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>unto all the people</n> הָאָ֔רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>of the land</n> וְאֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>and to</n> הַכֹּהֲנִ֖ים <sup>3548 </sup> <n>and to the priests</n> לֵאמֹ֑ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>saying</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>When</n> צַמְתֶּ֨ם <sup>6684 </sup> <n>When ye fasted</n> וְסָפ֜וֹד <sup>5594 </sup> <n>and mourned</n> בַּחֲמִישִׁ֣י <sup>2549 </sup> <n>in the fifth</n> וּבַשְּׁבִיעִ֗י <sup>7637 </sup> <n>and seventh</n> וְזֶה֙ <sup>2088 </sup> <n>these</n> שִׁבְעִ֣ים <sup>7657 </sup> <n>[month] even those seventy</n> שָׁנָ֔ה <sup>8141 </sup> <n>years</n> הֲצ֥וֹם <sup>6684 </sup> <n>did ye at all</n> צַמְתֻּ֖נִי <sup>6684 </sup> <n>fast</n> אָֽנִי׃ <sup>589 </sup> <n>I</n>
6: וְכִ֥י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>When</n> תֹאכְל֖וּ <sup>398 </sup> <n>And when ye did eat</n> וְכִ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>When</n> תִשְׁתּ֑וּ <sup>8354 </sup> <n>and when ye did drink</n> הֲל֤וֹא <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> אַתֶּם֙ <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n> הָאֹ֣כְלִ֔ים <sup>398 </sup> <n>did not ye eat</n> וְאַתֶּ֖ם <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n> הַשֹּׁתִֽים׃ <sup>8354 </sup> <n>[for yourselves] and drink</n>
7: הֲל֣וֹא <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַדְּבָרִ֗ים <sup>1697 </sup> <n>[Should ye] not [hear] the words</n> אֲשֶׁ֨ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> קָרָ֤א <sup>7121 </sup> <n>hath cried</n> יְהוָה֙ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>which the LORD</n> בְּיַד֙ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>by</n> הַנְּבִיאִ֣ים <sup>5030 </sup> <n>prophets</n> הָרִֽאשֹׁנִ֔ים <sup>7223 </sup> <n>the former</n> בִּהְי֤וֹת <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> יְרוּשָׁלִַ֙ם֙ <sup>3389 </sup> <n>when Jerusalem</n> יֹשֶׁ֣בֶת <sup>3427 </sup> <n>was inhabited</n> וּשְׁלֵוָ֔ה <sup>7961 </sup> <n>and in prosperity</n> וְעָרֶ֖יהָ <sup>5892 </sup> <n>and the cities</n> סְבִיבֹתֶ֑יהָ <sup>5439 </sup> <n>thereof round about her</n> וְהַנֶּ֥גֶב <sup>5045 </sup> <n>the south</n> וְהַשְּׁפֵלָ֖ה <sup>8219 </sup> <n>and the foothills</n> יֹשֵֽׁב׃ <sup>3427 </sup> <n>when [men] inhabited</n> פ
8: וַֽיְהִי֙ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>came</n> דְּבַר־ <sup>1697 </sup> <n>And the word</n> יְהוָ֔ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> זְכַרְיָ֖ה <sup>2148 </sup> <n>came unto Zechariah</n> לֵאמֹֽר׃ <sup>559 </sup> <n>saying</n>
9: כֹּ֥ה <sup>3541 </sup> <n>Thus</n> אָמַ֛ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>Thus speaketh</n> יְהוָ֥ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> צְבָא֖וֹת <sup>6635 </sup> <n>of hosts</n> לֵאמֹ֑ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>saying</n> מִשְׁפַּ֤ט <sup>4941 </sup> <n>judgment</n> אֱמֶת֙ <sup>571 </sup> <n>true.</n> שְׁפֹ֔טוּ <sup>8199 </sup> <n>Execute</n> וְחֶ֣סֶד <sup>2617 </sup> <n>mercy</n> וְרַֽחֲמִ֔ים <sup>7356 </sup> <n>and compassions</n> עֲשׂ֖וּ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>and shew</n> אִ֥ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>every man</n> אֶת־ <sup>854 </sup> <n>for</n> אָחִֽיו׃ <sup>251 </sup> <n>to his brother</n>
10: וְאַלְמָנָ֧ה <sup>490 </sup> <n>not the widow</n> וְיָת֛וֹם <sup>3490 </sup> <n>nor the fatherless</n> גֵּ֥ר <sup>1616 </sup> <n>the stranger</n> וְעָנִ֖י <sup>6041 </sup> <n>nor the poor</n> אַֽל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>not</n> תַּעֲשֹׁ֑קוּ <sup>6231 </sup> <n>And oppress</n> וְרָעַת֙ <sup>7451 </sup> <n>evil</n> אִ֣ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>against</n> אָחִ֔יו <sup>251 </sup> <n>his brother</n> אַֽל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>not</n> תַּחְשְׁב֖וּ <sup>2803 </sup> <n>and let none of you imagine</n> בִּלְבַבְכֶֽם׃ <sup>3824 </sup> <n>in your heart</n>
11: וַיְמָאֲנ֣וּ <sup>3985 </sup> <n>But they refused</n> לְהַקְשִׁ֔יב <sup>7181 </sup> <n>to hearken</n> וַיִּתְּנ֥וּ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>and turned</n> כָתֵ֖ף <sup>3802 </sup> <n>the shoulder</n> סֹרָ֑רֶת <sup>5637 </sup> <n>A stubborn</n> וְאָזְנֵיהֶ֖ם <sup>241 </sup> <n>their ears</n> הִכְבִּ֥ידוּ <sup>3513 </sup> <n>and stopped</n> מִשְּׁמֽוֹעַ׃ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>that they should not hear</n>
12: וְלִבָּ֞ם <sup>3820 </sup> <n>their hearts</n> שָׂ֣מוּ <sup>7760 </sup> <n>Yea they made</n> שָׁמִ֗יר <sup>8068 </sup> <n>[as] an adamant stone</n> מִ֠שְּׁמוֹעַ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>lest they should hear</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַתּוֹרָ֤ה <sup>8451 </sup> <n>the law</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַדְּבָרִים֙ <sup>1697 </sup> <n>and the words</n> אֲשֶׁ֨ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> שָׁלַ֜ח <sup>7971 </sup> <n>hath sent</n> יְהוָ֤ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>which the LORD</n> צְבָאוֹת֙ <sup>6635 </sup> <n>of hosts</n> בְּרוּח֔וֹ <sup>7307 </sup> <n>in his spirit</n> בְּיַ֖ד <sup>3027 </sup> <n>by</n> הַנְּבִיאִ֣ים <sup>5030 </sup> <n>prophets</n> הָרִֽאשֹׁנִ֑ים <sup>7223 </sup> <n>the former</n> וַֽיְהִי֙ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>came</n> קֶ֣צֶף <sup>7110 </sup> <n>wrath</n> גָּד֔וֹל <sup>1419 </sup> <n>therefore came a great</n> מֵאֵ֖ת <sup>853 </sup> יְהוָ֥ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>from the LORD</n> צְבָאֽוֹת׃ <sup>6635 </sup> <n>of hosts</n>
13: וַיְהִ֥י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> כַאֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>he</n> קָרָ֖א <sup>7121 </sup> <n>Therefore it is come to pass [that] as he cried</n> וְלֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> שָׁמֵ֑עוּ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>and they would not hear</n> כֵּ֤ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>so</n> יִקְרְאוּ֙ <sup>7121 </sup> <n>so they cried</n> וְלֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> אֶשְׁמָ֔ע <sup>8085 </sup> <n>and I would not hear</n> אָמַ֖ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>saith</n> יְהוָ֥ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> צְבָאֽוֹת׃ <sup>6635 </sup> <n>of hosts</n>
14: וְאֵ֣סָעֲרֵ֗ם <sup>5590 </sup> <n>But I scattered them with a whirlwind</n> עַ֤ל <sup>5921 </sup> <n>among</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> הַגּוֹיִם֙ <sup>1471 </sup> <n>among all the nations</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>whom</n> לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>have not</n> יְדָע֔וּם <sup>3045 </sup> <n>whom they knew</n> וְהָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <sup>776 </sup> <n>not Thus the land</n> נָשַׁ֣מָּה <sup>8047 </sup> <n>desolate</n> אַֽחֲרֵיהֶ֔ם <sup>310 </sup> <n>after</n> מֵֽעֹבֵ֖ר <sup>5674 </sup> <n>them that no man passed through</n> וּמִשָּׁ֑ב <sup>7725 </sup> <n>nor returned</n> וַיָּשִׂ֥ימוּ <sup>7760 </sup> <n>for they laid</n> אֶֽרֶץ־ <sup>776 </sup> <n>land</n> חֶמְדָּ֖ה <sup>2532 </sup> <n>the pleasant</n> לְשַׁמָּֽה׃ <sup>8074 </sup> <n>was desolate</n> פ
